description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber, allowing them to stretch and become immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

users.circumstances: Luffy ate the fruit as a child

abilityReveals.description: Luffy inflates his body like a balloon and releases a devastating blast of air toward his opponents, creating a powerful shockwave attack.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Luffy uses this technique during the raid on Franky House to overwhelm the Franky Family members.

description: Allows the user to transform between human, hybrid, and animal forms. When consumed by an animal, grants human intelligence and abilities.

users.circumstances: Chopper ate the fruit as a young reindeer

abilityReveals.description: A powerful attack technique that Chopper uses in his transformed state during combat.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Chopper demonstrates this technique during the fight at Franky House, contributing to the crew's overwhelming victory.
